articles.title: Under-Skin Implant Could Help Treat Type 1 Diabetes - Technology Networks
articles.description: An under-the-skin implant that secretes insulin could provide an easier, long-term and less invasive way to treat type 1 diabetes.
articles.content: A collaboration between researchers from Cornell and University of Alberta, Edmonton, has created a new technique to treat Type 1 diabetes: implanting a device inside a pocket under the skin that can… [+5166 chars]

articles.title: Bridge-sized asteroid to come as close as 5.5mn km to Earth, reveals NASA - HT Tech
articles.description: A Near-Earth Asteroid which is bigger than the Empire State Building is predicted to pass Earth closely today, December 6. Know the asteroid’s speed, distance of approach, size, and other details, as per NASA.
